thread.section_title: Grange Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Everything perfect!
thread.title_full: Everything perfect! - Review of Grange Wellington Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Ailedac
title: Everything perfect!
text:
This well located hotel is all you need in London. Well furnished rooms and a very good continental breakfast. We asked for a room high floor - far from elevator and we had a very beautiful room located on the third floor. This hotel is not expensive but it has nothing less then an expensive hotel could offer.
I definetly will recommend this accomodation at all!
